content.en: Cloud optimization: Researchers have been exploring various ways to improve the efficiency and performance of cloud computing systems. They have been using advanced algorithms, such as meta-heuristic algorithms, particle swarm optimization, and bat algorithms, to address different challenges. These algorithms are being employed to achieve tasks like load balancing, energy efficiency, task scheduling, resource allocation, and workflow optimization in cloud computing environments.
content.da: Cloud-optimering: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige måder at forbedre effektiviteten og ydeevnen af cloud computing-systemer. De har anvendt avancerede algoritmer, såsom metaheuristiske algoritmer, partikel-sværmoptimering og flagermus-algoritmer, for at løse forskellige udfordringer. Disse algoritmer bliver brugt til at udføre opgaver som belastningsbalancering, energieffektivitet, opgavestyring, ressourceallokering og workflow-optimering i cloud computing-miljøer.
